card.name: Amnesia
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all nonland cards.

card.name: Angry Mob
card.text: Trample As long as it's your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Swamps your opponents control. As long as it's not your turn, Angry Mob's power and toughness are each 2.

card.name: Apprentice Wizard
card.text: {U}, {T}: Add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ashes to Ashes
card.text: Exile two target nonartifact creatures. Ashes to Ashes deals 5 damage to you.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.text: Trample Haste At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Banshee
card.text: {X}, {T}: Banshee deals half X damage, rounded down, to target creature or player, and half X damage, rounded up, to you.

card.name: Barl's Cage
card.text: {3}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Blood of the Martyr
card.text: Until end of turn, if damage would be dealt to any creature, you may have that damage dealt to you instead.

card.name: Bog Rats
card.text: Bog Rats can't be blocked by Walls.

card.name: Bone Flute
card.text: {2}, {T}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Book of Rass
card.text: {2}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

card.name: Brainwash
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Brothers of Fire
card.text: {1}{R}{R}: Brothers of Fire deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Cave People
card.text: Whenever Cave People attacks, it gets +1/-2 until end of turn. {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn.

card.name: City of Shadows
card.text: {T}, Exile a creature you control: Put a storage counter on City of Shadows. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool for each storage counter on City of Shadows.

card.name: Cleansing
card.text: For each land, destroy that land unless any player pays 1 life.

card.name: Coal Golem
card.text: {3}, Sacrifice Coal Golem: Add {R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Curse Artifact
card.text: Enchant artifact At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Curse Artifact deals 2 damage to that player unless he or she sacrifices that artifact.

card.name: Dance of Many
card.text: When Dance of Many enters the battlefield, put a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature onto the battlefield. When Dance of Many leaves the battlefield, exile the token. When the token leaves the battlefield, sacrifice Dance of Many. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dance of Many unless you pay {U}{U}.

card.name: Dark Heart of the Wood
card.text: Sacrifice a Forest: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Dark Sphere
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Dark Sphere: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent half that damage, rounded down.

card.name: Deep Water
card.text: {U}: Until end of turn, if you tap a land you control for mana, it produces {U} instead of any other type.

card.name: Diabolic Machine
card.text: {3}: Regenerate Diabolic Machine.

card.name: Drowned
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Drowned.

card.name: Dust to Dust
card.text: Exile two target artifacts.

card.name: Eater of the Dead
card.text: {0}: If Eater of the Dead is tapped, exile target creature card from a graveyard and untap Eater of the Dead.

card.name: Electric Eel
card.text: When Electric Eel enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you. {R}{R}: Electric Eel gets +2/+0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. Elves of Deep Shadow deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Erosion
card.text: Enchant land At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted land's controller, destroy that land unless that player pays {1} or 1 life.

card.name: Eternal Flame
card.text: Eternal Flame deals X damage to target opponent, where X is the number of Mountains you control. It deals half X damage, rounded up, to you.

card.name: Exorcist
card.text: {1}{W}, {T}: Destroy target black creature.

card.name: Fasting
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a hunger counter on Fasting. Then destroy Fasting if it has five or more hunger counters on it. If you would begin your draw step, you may skip that step instead. If you do, you gain 2 life. When you draw a card, destroy Fasting.

card.name: Fellwar Stone
card.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

card.name: Festival
card.text: Cast Festival only during an opponent's upkeep. Creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Fire and Brimstone
card.text: Fire and Brimstone deals 4 damage to target player who declared an attacking creature this turn and 4 damage to you.

card.name: Fire Drake
card.text: Flying {R}: Fire Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Fissure
card.text: Destroy target creature or land. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Flood
card.text: {U}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

card.name: Fountain of Youth
card.text: {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

card.name: Frankenstein's Monster
card.text: As Frankenstein's Monster enters the battlefield, exile X creature cards from your graveyard. If you can't, put Frankenstein's Monster into its owner's graveyard instead of onto the battlefield. For each creature card exiled this way, Frankenstein's Monster enters the battlefield with a +2/+0, +1/+1, or +0/+2 counter on it.

card.name: Gaea's Touch
card.text: {0}: You may put a basic Forest card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn. Sacrifice Gaea's Touch: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Ghost Ship
card.text: Flying {U}{U}{U}: Regenerate Ghost Ship.

card.name: Giant Shark
card.text: Giant Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. Whenever Giant Shark blocks or becomes blocked by a creature that has been dealt damage this turn, Giant Shark gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Giant Shark.

card.name: Goblin Caves
card.text: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

card.name: Goblin Digging Team
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

card.name: Goblin Rock Sled
card.text: Trample Goblin Rock Sled doesn't untap during your untap step if it attacked during your last turn. Goblin Rock Sled can't attack unless defending player controls a Mountain.

card.name: Goblin Shrine
card.text: Enchant land As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0. When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

card.name: Goblin Wizard
card.text: {T}: You may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. {R}: Target Goblin gains protection from white until end of turn.

card.name: Goblins of the Flarg
card.text: Mountainwalk When you control a Dwarf, sacrifice Goblins of the Flarg.

card.name: Grave Robbers
card.text: {B}, {T}: Exile target artifact card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Hidden Path
card.text: Green creatures have forestwalk.

card.name: Holy Light
card.text: Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Inferno
card.text: Inferno deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Inquisition
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. Inquisition deals damage to that player equal to the number of white cards in his or her hand.

card.name: Knights of Thorn
card.text: Protection from red; banding

card.name: Land Leeches
card.text: First strike

card.name: Leviathan
card.text: Trample Leviathan enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice two Islands. If you do, untap Leviathan. Leviathan can't attack unless you sacrifice two Islands.

card.name: Living Armor
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Living Armor: Put X +0/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Lurker
card.text: Lurker can't be the target of spells unless it attacked or blocked this turn.

card.name: Mana Clash
card.text: You and target opponent each flip a coin. Mana Clash deals 1 damage to each player whose coin comes up tails. Repeat this process until both players' coins come up heads on the same flip.

card.name: Mana Vortex
card.text: When you cast Mana Vortex, counter it unless you sacrifice a land. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a land. When there are no lands on the battlefield, sacrifice Mana Vortex.

card.name: Marsh Gas
card.text: All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Marsh Viper
card.text: Whenever Marsh Viper deals damage to a player, that player gets two poison counters.

card.name: Martyr's Cry
card.text: Exile all white creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller draws a card.

card.name: Maze of Ith
card.text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

card.name: Merfolk Assassin
card.text: {T}: Destroy target creature with islandwalk.

card.name: Mind Bomb
card.text: Each player may discard up to three cards. Mind Bomb deals damage to each player equal to 3 minus the number of cards he or she discarded this way.

card.name: Miracle Worker
card.text: {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a creature you control.

card.name: Morale
card.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Murk Dwellers
card.text: Whenever Murk Dwellers attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+0 until end of combat.

card.name: Nameless Race
card.text: Trample As Nameless Race enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. The amount you pay can't be more than the total number of white nontoken permanents your opponents control plus the total number of white cards in their graveyards. Nameless Race's power and toughness are each equal to the life paid as it entered the battlefield.

card.name: Necropolis
card.text: Defender Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Put X +0/+1 counters on Necropolis, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Niall Silvain
card.text: {G}{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Orc General
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice another Orc or Goblin: Other Orc creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: People of the Woods
card.text: People of the Woods's toughness is equal to the number of Forests you control.

card.name: Pikemen
card.text: First strike; banding

card.name: Preacher
card.text: You may choose not to untap Preacher during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Preacher remains tapped, gain control of target creature of an opponent's choice he or she controls.

card.name: Psychic Allergy
card.text: As Psychic Allergy enters the battlefield, choose a color. At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Psychic Allergy deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of nontoken permanents of the chosen color he or she controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy Psychic Allergy unless you sacrifice two Islands.

card.name: Rag Man
card.text: {B}{B}{B}, {T}: Target opponent reveals his or her hand and discards a creature card at random. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: Reflecting Mirror
card.text: {X}, {T}: Change the target of target spell with a single target if that target is you. The new target must be a player. X is twice the converted mana cost of that spell.

card.name: Riptide
card.text: Tap all blue creatures.

card.name: Runesword
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target attacking creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Runesword. If the creature deals damage to a creature this turn, the creature dealt damage can't be regenerated this turn. If a creature dealt damage by the targeted creature would die this turn, exile that creature instead.

card.name: Safe Haven
card.text: {2}, {T}: Exile target creature you control. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice Safe Haven. If you do, return each card exiled with Safe Haven to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Savaen Elves
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Destroy target Aura attached to a land.

card.name: Scarecrow
card.text: {6}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by creatures with flying.

card.name: Scarwood Bandits
card.text: Forestwalk {2}{G}, {T}: Unless an opponent pays {2}, gain control of target artifact for as long as Scarwood Bandits remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Scarwood Hag
card.text: {G}{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains forestwalk until end of turn. {T}: Target creature loses forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Scavenger Folk
card.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Season of the Witch
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Season of the Witch unless you pay 2 life. At the beginning of the end step, destroy all untapped creatures that didn't attack this turn, except for creatures that couldn't attack.

card.name: Sisters of the Flame
card.text: {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Skull of Orm
card.text: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sorrow's Path
card.text: {T}: Choose two target blocking creatures an opponent controls. If each of those creatures could block all creatures that the other is blocking, remove both of them from combat. Each one then blocks all creatures the other was blocking. Whenever Sorrow's Path becomes tapped, it deals 2 damage to you and each creature you control.

card.name: Spitting Slug
card.text: Whenever Spitting Slug blocks or becomes blocked, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn. Otherwise, each creature blocking or blocked by Spitting Slug gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Standing Stones
card.text: {1}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Stone Calendar
card.text: Spells you cast cost up to {1} less to cast.

card.name: Sunken City
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sunken City unless you pay {U}{U}. Blue creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Tangle Kelp
card.text: Enchant creature When Tangle Kelp enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step if it attacked during its controller's last turn.

card.name: The Fallen
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, The Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent it has dealt damage to this game.

card.name: Tivadar's Crusade
card.text: Destroy all Goblins.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Tower of Coireall
card.text: {T}: Target creature can't be blocked by Walls this turn.

card.name: Tracker
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Tracker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Tracker.

card.name: Uncle Istvan
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Uncle Istvan by creatures.

card.name: Venom
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy the other creature at end of combat.

card.name: Wand of Ith
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target player reveals a card at random from his or her hand. If it's a land card, that player discards it unless he or she pays 1 life. If it isn't a land card, the player discards it unless he or she pays life equal to its converted mana cost. Activate this ability only during your turn.

card.name: War Barge
card.text: {3}: Target creature gains islandwalk until end of turn. When War Barge leaves the battlefield this turn, destroy that creature. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Water Wurm
card.text: Water Wurm gets +0/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.

card.name: Whippoorwill
card.text: {G}{G}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn. Damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn can't be prevented or dealt instead to another creature or player. When the creature dies this turn, exile the creature.

card.name: Witch Hunter
card.text: {T}: Witch Hunter deals 1 damage to target player. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Word of Binding
card.text: Tap X target creatures.

card.name: Worms of the Earth
card.text: Players can't play lands. Lands can't enter the battlefield. At the beginning of each upkeep, any player may sacrifice two lands or have Worms of the Earth deal 5 damage to him or her. If a player does either, destroy Worms of the Earth.

card.name: Wormwood Treefolk
card.text: {G}{G}: Wormwood Treefolk gains forestwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you. {B}{B}: Wormwood Treefolk gains swampwalk until end of turn and deals 2 damage to you.
